system.description: When you act to maintain control of your territory and assets when they come under threat, roll +Grasp.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You lose control. Reduce Reach by 1 and the GM will tell you what you've lost.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You maintain control, but choose one: reduce Reach by 1, take 1 Sleepers, or accept that maintaining control required harsh measures.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You maintain control without cost. If you wish, you can also strengthen your position.
